column1: was read in evidence at the closure of the case for the party that produced the document
without objection from the opposing party and the learned district judge  having ruled
that the document had not been proved, held following Sri Lanka Ports Authority and
Another  v.  Jugolinija  â€“  Boal  East  that,  in  view  of  the  cursus  curiae  of  civil  courts,  the
